Reference

All functions

AFM.artificialImage()

Create an artificial AFMdata object

AFM.crop()

Crops an AFM image

AFM.dataType()

Get AFMdata object type: image, frequency, force, spectroscopy

AFM.flatten()

Flattens an AFM image using a plane fit

AFM.getLine()

AFM horizontal or vertical profile line

AFM.getSampleImages()

Sample AFM image file names

AFM.hhcf()

Height-Height Correlation Function for AFM Image

AFM.histogram()

Histogram of AFM image

AFM.history()

History of AFM file generation

AFM.import()

Imports AFM file

AFM.isFileValid()

Valid AFM file

AFM.isImage()

checks if the object is an AFM image

AFM.linePlot()

Plots AFM line

AFM.lineProfile()

Line Profile

AFM.math.params()

Math Parameters for AFMdata Object

AFM.raster()

Raster data frame

AFM.readDB()

Reads AFM object from SQL DB

AFM.selectChannel()

AFM select channels

AFM.specData()

read spectroscopy channel data

AFM.specHeader()

read spectroscopy channel header info

AFM.writeDB()

Write AFM object to SQL DB

AFMdata() AFMdata()

AFM image class

AFMinfo()

AFMinfo object

AFMinfo.item()

Specific information about AFM image

get.Hsd()

Computes the standard deviation in height Hsd

initialize(<AFMdata>)

Constructor method of AFMImage Class.

plot(<AFMdata>)

Graph of AFMdata object

print(<AFMdata>)

Print AFMdata object

summary(<AFMdata>)

summary of AFMdata object

summary(<AFMinfo>)

summary for AFMinfo object

summary(<AFMmath>)

Summary of computed AFM image parameters
